amendment.description: Page 1141, line 18, after the first dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $10,889,900)". ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to reduce by 10% general administrative and departmental salary and expense accounts in Division H, and transfer the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Mitchell.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
